titleCN: 任天堂实验室手工纸模赛车套装
description: 2008年美国电子游戏分析师曾经指出：“就算纸箱子印上Nintendo，任天堂的粉丝也都会购买”，如今这个预言实现了，这款任天堂实验室手工纸模赛车套装让你用纸箱子做出和Switch互动的赛车
content: Put yourself right in the driver’s seat of your favorite racing games with help from the Nintendo Labo vehicle kit. Using this fun DIY kit you’ll be able to make cardboard creations that can actually be used with your Nintendo Switch.

description: 不管你喜欢《勇闯夺命岛》中的凯奇还是《绝命毒师》里的老白，作为一名化学爱好者，这款将周期表中化学元素放置在树脂盒中的系列产品，能让你近距离欣赏大自然中原装的金银钛钪钴钠锌
content: Get an up close and personal view of the elements on the periodic table with these natural earth elements acrylic cubes. Earth’s most recognized elements like gold, silver, and titanium are all encased in crystal clear 50mm Lucite acrylic for your viewing pleasure.

description: 越来越多007风格的军情六处产品从电影大荧幕走进了我们的生活，这款看似普通的黑色手提箱表面覆盖着高效防水的100瓦单晶硅太阳能电池，能让你在有太阳的地方永远保持电子设备能量充足
content: No wall outlet in sight? No problem! With Goal Zero’s solar powered briefcase you’ll be able to keep your devices juiced up no matter where you are. It boasts 100 watts of highly-efficient waterproof monocrystalline solar cells, and it folds in half for easy transport.

description: 想让你的拖车变得与众不同？这款8英尺长用12号规格钢打造的霸王龙头骨拖车挂钩适用于所有拖车标准且有多款颜色可选进行粉末涂料喷漆，给你的座驾瞬间增添《侏罗纪公园》主题的史前风格
content: Give your ride a cool pre-historic touch by attaching this T-Rex cover to your trailer hitch. This 8 inch long dino head is crafted from fabricated 12 gauge steel and is powder coated for maximum durability – making this a great gift for any dinosaur enthusiast.

description: 致所有健康饮食爱好者：科学家和营养师们研究发现，这款生长周期极短的红皮藻在提供比羽衣甘蓝多两倍的营养同时，还能在煎炸之后变出和熏猪肉一样的味道和口感，让你的健康食谱不再乏味
content: Good news everyone – scientists have discovered a seaweed that tastes like bacon while offering twice the nutritional value of kale! This miracle seaweed is a fast-growing strain of red marine algae known as dulse, that tastes just like bacon when fried.

description: 不知道产品设计师是不是从安徒生的《打火匣》经典童话中汲取的灵感，但在三星手机电池或自燃或爆炸的新闻之后还试图在锂电池上添加喷火装置，绝对彰显了设计师的气魄和使用者的硬汉本色
content: Avoid having to bum a light off a stranger by carrying around this smartphone lighter case. The unique and practical design incorporates a sleek lighter along the back so that you can easily flip it open with your finger and light up.

description: 这款憨态可掬内置高保真扬声器的橙色绒毛跳舞猫，可通过自带的音频线与任何音响设备连接，并在播放你最喜欢曲目的同时献上令人捧腹的舞步，绝对是家庭聚会公司派对不可或缺的暖场之宝
content: Get the party started with this dancing bear speaker! As soon as you flip the small switch on his left paw, this cute little party animal comes alive and begins busting a move to your favorite tunes – making it a must have for any house party.

titleEN: Samsung Wall Blending QLED Flat TV
description: 完美的电视呈上视觉的盛宴，三星这款75寸QLED平板电视将对色彩与图像的处理上升到了全新的境界，在给你带来无与伦比观看体验的同时，独特的周边环境自融入设计能让其完美契合你的家居风格
content: Treat your eyes to a visual masterpiece of brilliant color and crisp imagery every time you watch TV by upgrading to the Samsung wall blending QLED TV. It features an innovative ambient mode designed to blend in seamlessly to your home’s decor.

description: 这款容量80盎司内置制冷冰室和装饰灯光的桌面啤酒分酒器，帮你轻松将客厅打造成炫酷格调的体育酒吧，让你和朋友们在观赏精彩体育赛事的同时，开怀畅饮冰爽可口泡沫丰腴的美味佳酿
content: The BrewTender tabletop beer dispenser will ensure you’ll always have a steady supply of nice cold beer all night long. Perfect for any home bar, this awesome accessory keeps up to 80 ounces of your favorite brew ice cold until the very last drop.

titleCN: 便携式周边声音中和器
description: 这款可以通过手机APP进行设置的便携式周边声音中和器在有效消除临近噪音的同时，可播放轻松助眠的乐曲或营造夏夜森林湖边露营时的自然白噪音，让你每个夜晚都能睡得酣畅香甜
content: Escape from the stress of everyday life using this noise blocking personal zone creator. It easily sticks onto any desk or window and utilizes anti-vibration technology to block off nearby vibrating objects to create a bubble of serenity.

description: 无处安放工作室里四处散落的图钉？这款可爱的小绵羊图钉容器设计新颖，75颗不锈钢和塑料制成的图钉巧妙地伪装成了卷曲的羊毛，给你提供简洁方便的同时也增添了些许趣味和创意
content: Add a dash of adorable to your boring workstation by storing your pins inside this cute little sheep push pin holder. This small little sheep comes with 75 white head push pins that will masquerade as the sheep’s wool when they’re not in use.

description: 这款设计独特的存钱罐把收集闲置硬币的过程巧妙地变成了一款有趣的游戏：只要你将硬币放置在指定的位置，一只憨态可掬的小猫就会偷偷地从盒子里伸出爪子，喵喵叫着将其揽入怀中
content: Make saving more appealing than ever by storing your loose change inside this coin stealing piggy bank. Each time you place a coin over the designated space, an adorable little white kitty pops out of the box and grabs your coin using his small paw.

titleCN: 用贴纸创造的世界名画
description: 这款别出心裁的产品让你通过贴纸来复刻包括达芬奇的《蒙娜丽莎》、波提切利的《维纳斯的诞生》、扬维米尔的《戴珍珠耳环的少女》等12副享誉世界的油画名作，是进行艺术启蒙绝佳的途径
content: Recreate some of the world’s most iconic masterpieces with your own two hands with this awesome Paint By Sticker book. It comes with everything you’ll need to create twelve full color paintings like the Mona Lisa, The Birth of Venus, and Girl with a Pearl Earring.

titleCN: That's What She said 咖啡杯
titleEN: That's What She said Coffee Mug
description: 对于所有喜欢美版《办公室》的剧迷们来说，没有任何一句其他台词能更有效地唤醒对于史蒂夫·卡瑞尔精湛演技的记忆，这款镌刻着麦克.斯考特经典反讽口头禅的咖啡杯，是绝妙的破冰开场白
content: Raise morale at the workplace by celebrating mediocrity with this humorous “world’s okayest employee” coffee mug. This hilarious 11 ounce novelty ceramic mug comes with the funny quip printed on both sides, making this a great gift for any underachieving employee.

Sleep without fear of insects crawling into your orifices at night by camping in the Nube hammock shelter. The innovative design allows you to utilize surrounding trees to create a suspended space to keep you safe and dry while outdoors.

titleEN: 24K Gold Plated Rim Agate Drink Coasters
description: 这款由巴西天然玛瑙石切割后纯手工打造的24K镀金边玛瑙石杯垫每一块都有着独一无二的天然纹路，除了能完美地契合你的佳酿之外，也给你的厨房添加了些许的异域情趣与低调奢华
content: Add brilliant natural color to your home bar by setting your refreshing beverages down on these sliced agate drink coasters. Each coaster in the set is crafted from gorgeous sliced Brazilian agate that is complemented by an elegant 24 karat gold plated rim.

description: 生活中每一个细节都蕴藏着巨大的商机，这款将无用工程学发挥到淋漓尽致的终极版运动毛巾提供了磁石挂钩、通用拉链、隐秘口袋、触摸式啮合、防掉落保护等让人瞠目结舌的全新功能
content: This revolutionary fitness accessory is the pinnacle of gym towel engineering. It features a magnetic clip, universal zipper, 4″ x 15″ pocket, a touch sensitive mesh, anti-fall sleeve, and even a gym-side / skin-side so you can only let your skin touch one side of the towel.

description: 当炽热的骄阳让你感到脱水和窒息时，这款自带18伏锂电池的便携式雾化风扇能通过水管连接或被放置在冰桶上，被雾化后喷射出的清凉水滴能让你在烈日炎炎的夏日里时刻保持冰爽
content: Stay cool while Mother Nature tries to suffocate you with her warm embrace by using this bucket top misting fan. It comes with an 18-volt lithium-ion battery, and it can be operated with either a garden hose or with a bucket filled with water.

titleCN: 乐高007系列阿斯顿马丁模型车
description: 乐高这款内含1295片模块的007系列阿斯顿马丁模型车，让每一位忠实的影迷都能在家里以令人叹为观止的细节复刻邦德最为经典的奢华座驾，包括电影中出现的副驾驶弹出器和防弹后视镜
content: Get your hands on 007’s iconic ride without going broke by putting together this LEGO James Bond Aston Martin. This 1295 piece set depicts Bond’s classic Aston Martin DB5 with extraordinary detail – like a passenger ejector seat and a rear view bulletproof window.

titleCN: 可食用巧克力棉花糖华夫饼酒杯
description: 华夫饼制成的酒杯里内嵌着全麦饼干碎屑、比利时巧克力、以及棉花糖奶油，这款每个100卡路里的可食用巧克力棉花糖华夫饼酒杯，能给你的味蕾带来前所未有的美味享受和甜品体验
content: Send your taste buds out-of-this-world by indulging in this edible s’mores waffle shot cup. Each small 100-calorie cup is made from a Belgian chocolate coated waffle cone complemented by a crumbled graham cracker and marshmallow cream filling.

description: 朋友聚会时在迷你高尔夫和桌球的选择中左右为难？这款别出心裁的迷你版高尔夫台球完美融合了两款游戏的乐趣，让你既有机会炫耀伍兹般的挥杆技巧，也有机会展示奥沙利文般的一杆清台
content: When the family’s torn over how to spend quality time, the miniature golf billiards are sure to meet all of your family’s requirements for fun. It combines the lightheartedness of mini golfing with the competitiveness of pool for a challenging game that is ideal for all ages.

description: 拥有了属于自己的房子之后难免需要爬高上低去清理积水槽或更换空调滤芯，这款由14级规格粉末涂层钢打造并配有耐用尼龙扣带的爬梯固定器适用于所有地表环境，能有效地确保你的人身安全
content: Avoid serious injury while doing handywork around the house by placing the ladder stabilizer underneath your ladder. This versatile all-terrain tool is crafted from 14 gauge powder coated steel and fitted with durable nylon straps to secure the ladder in place.

titleEN: Make Your Own Hot Sauce Kit
description: 没有任何一件礼物能比吃后让人喉咙喷火的高品质辣椒酱更使人血脉偾张了，这款套装除了包含自制辣椒酱需要的工具外，还自带了安丘辣椒、奇波雷烟熏辣椒、哈巴内罗灯笼辣椒等顶级辣椒粉
content: Make your favorite hot head jump with joy when they open your gift and find this cool make your own hot sauce kit. This nifty little kit comes with everything needed to whip up 7 bottles of some deliciously spicy gourmet hot sauce.

titleCN: 一氧化二氮红酒开瓶器
description: 这款包装精美设计新颖号称世界上最简单最快速的红酒开瓶器可以彻底地颠覆你过往的一切经验：只需轻轻按动按钮，一氧化二氮增压器会产生8g压力轻松将红酒瓶的软木塞完好无损吸出并开启
content: Effortlessly uncork your bottle with the push of a button by grabbing a hold of this Nitrous oxide powered wine opener. It comes with an 8g N2O charger that will instantly pop open your bottle with no mess so that you can keep the wine flowing all night long.

description: 这款用可回收钢材打造的脏话炸弹镇纸，除了帮你保持办公桌上各种文件摘要和会议记录井然有序之外，还能用略显无厘头的幽默元素和反讽方式在严肃的职场环境里让人会心一笑
content: Now you can drop f-bombs all day long and be commended for your organization and professionalism around the workplace with the f-bomb paperweight. Made from recycled steel, it’s great for keeping memos neat and tidy on your desk.

description: 这款用结实的浇注聚树脂打造并手工涂漆的9.5英尺高陶瓷防水地精塑像，让你把花园和草坪变得更有生趣的同时，以独特的方式向艾尔·帕西诺在疤面人电影中的经典造型完美致敬
content: Say hello to our little friend – and his little friend – with the Scarface lawn gnome. This aggressive little fellow stands vigilant and ready to go postal on the first neighbor or neighborhood pet who accidentally stumbles onto your perfectly manicured lawn.

description: 这款设计别致在市场上绝无仅有的iPhone电击枪防水手机壳，不但可以有效地保护手机并为其充电，还能在危险的时刻化身为可产生7百万伏的电压的电击枪，让你击退任何可能的袭击者
content: The iPhone stun gun case is the only case on the market that doubles as a personal bodyguard. Apart from protecting your treasured iPhone, the case comes with a built in stun gun capable of delivering up to 7,000,000 volts of knockout power to an assailant.

description: 这款用西部红雪松打造的全自动蜜糖收集蜂巢制作精细唯美设计新颖大胆，其专利技术极大简化了繁复的取蜜过程，使采集蜂蜜变得像开水龙头一样简单，让养蜂变成了一个能在后院实现的梦想
content: Enjoy a steady supply of all natural honey without risking getting stung by using the automatic honey collecting beehive. The intrepid design of this quaint little cottage allows you to simply turn the tap and watch the honey flow directly into your jar.

Pound your meats with god-like fury by wielding this mini Mjolnir. Shaped like the Thunder God’s iconic weapon, it features a comfy silicone grip and sports an engraving that reads “whosoever holds this hammer, if they be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor!”.

Ensure those annoying little blood suckers leave you alone by sparking up this “die mosquitoes” citronella candle. Handmade in New Jersey, this sixteen ounce candle burns for over eighty hours and features an eye-catching “die mosquitoes” decal on the exterior.

Light up the night wherever you go by hitting the town dressed in these eye-catching fiber optic LED shoes. These stunning and super comfy sneakers feature 3 dynamic color modes and can be set to 1 of 7 different hues like red, turquoise, purple, and yellow.

Bring color and life into your home or yard – even if you’re tight on space – by using this freestanding vertical planter garden. This weather-resistant garden comes with five sturdy vertical garden beds and features a cascading water drainage system.

Use your smartphone to see what’s behind your car by mounting the ZUS smart rear view camera to your ride. This weatherproof camera installs without needing any drilling or wiring and gives you a 170 degree wide angle view that lets you see everything – day or night.

Enjoy delicious rotis and wraps at the touch of a button by bringing the Rotimatic flatbread maker into your kitchen. This handy appliance allows you to choose the thickness and roast level of each 7 inch diameter flat bread you make.

titleEN: The Best Cat Litter Box Ever Made
content: Quit scooping out nasty lumps of cat poop once and for all by using the Luuup litter box. The brilliant design utilizes three identical trays that you stack on top of one another to create a perpetual sifting loop that makes clean up a breeze.

titleEN: Automatic Tennis Ball Launching Dog Toy
content: Tire out your energetic little pup without lifting a finger using this automatic tennis ball launching dog toy. It can be set to a throwing distance of either 10, 20, or 30 feet, making it a great training tool and recreational toy for dogs of all ages.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Toilet Seat
content: Wave goodbye to nighttime aiming problems thanks to the glow in the dark toilet seat. It glows with the light of a thousand glow sticks so even if you’re too drunk or tired to find the light switch cloaked under the dead of night, you’ll still be able to take care of business.

Ensure your guests remain good and drunk during your next pool party by hosting a beer pong tournament on this floating table. Made from a lightweight and durable tear resistant foam, it’s designed to fit standard 16 oz party cups and rolls up for easy transport.

Ensure your pint-sized Caped Crusader moves around the house in style by placing him inside this baby Batman walker. Modeled after the iconic Batmobile, it features an easy-swivel steering wheel and gear shifter in addition to flashing lights and cool sound effects.

Get serious about your thumb wrestling career by stepping up to the big leagues with this pro thumb wrestling arena. This fun-sized ring will make your next thumb battle look like a high-stakes pro-wrestling match – just like on TV!

Break down language barriers when travelling abroad using this smart international language translator. This handy two-way device will recognize what you say and instantly speak out loud the translation so that you can effectively communicate with the locals.

Chug down an entire bottle faster than you ever thought possible using the Head Rush beer bottle bong! Simply attach this must-have party accessory to the end of your beer bottle, raise it up, and let the delicious nectar rush into your mouth!

Conveniently transport all your fishing gear using only one hand with the Rod-Runner pro fishing rod rack. This hardened ABS plastic rack can easily carry up to 5 rods without tangling your lines, breaking guides, or damaging your equipment or reels in any way.

This virtual reality backpack PC lets you break free from cords so that you can experience VR the way it was truly meant to be. It boasts specs like a 6th-gen Core i7 Intel processor and a NVIDIA GTX 1060 in a light-weight package that you can comfortably wear.

Tired of hitting golf balls with your club? Send balls soaring through the air in an entirely new way by launching them out of the golf ball cannon! This black powder cannon features a 1018 steel barrel, brass hardware, and sits on an elegant oak carriage.

This mosquito trapping and zapping vortex will ruthlessly decimate all pesky flies without harmful chemicals or sprays! Once the 368nm UV light lures the flies in, a 7-blade inner fan traps them inside where they meet their quick and untimely end.

With this Hot Wheels GoPro mount car you’ll be able to get a first person view of the insane ride your little car takes when you place it on the track. It allows you to safely and securely mount your GoPro Hero 5 Session camera onto the car to capture incredible footage.

This beautifully designed cocktail kit serves 6 premium Old Fashioned cocktails. The kit includes a custom cocktail spoon & muddler, 3 cocktail picks, and cocktail napkins, in addition to all the necessary ingredients you’ll need to make a top-notch Old Fashioned.

Keeping tabs on your daily physical activity is simpler than ever with WELT – the smart fitness and activity tracking belt. This stylish high-tech accessory comes with built-in sensors that measure your physical activity and then relay the info to your phone via Bluetooth.

Turn the heat up at your next performance by awing spectators with the open palm fireball launcher. With these discreet devices strapped to your wrists, you’ll be able to create magnificent balls of fire that will make you look like a fire-wielding sorcerer.

Enjoy some soothing matcha tea from the comfort of home using this matcha green tea set. This neat little gift box comes with everything required to whip up an authentic matcha beverage, such as a Japanese made bowl and bamboo utensils.

Keep your home clean and fresh when potty training your puppy by using this self-cleaning automatic indoor dog potty. It comes with built-in sensors that prevent the motor from running when your dog is on the potty and will automatically wrap and clear the pads afterwards.

Thanks to Crocs you’ll now be able to wear heels all day long without torturing your poor feet! Made using their signature Croslite material, these ultra comfortable high heels come with soft straps fitted with an elastic gore for added comfort in addition to durable synthetic soles.

Save a bundle on roaming fees while you travel around the world by staying connected using the global WiFi hotspot device. It requires no embedded SIM card, simply switch it on and enjoy surfing the web in over a hundred different countries at discounted rates.

Step up your selfie game by ensuring you always have the perfect lighting with this LED iPhone case. Available in a range of shades that include black, pink, and mint, each case comes with a built-in LED strip around the edge to provide extra lighting when you need it.

Make your next soak more colorful and relaxing than ever by dropping in one of these giant bath bombs. Each set includes a dozen 5-ounce bombs that are handmade using all natural and organic ingredients that will smooth and moisturize your skin.

Turn your vehicle into a safe and cozy camper with the pickup truck bed tent. This portable shelter fits most pickup truck beds and comes with sealed windows along with features like an extra large entrance to make your stay in the outdoors as pleasant as possible.

This pineapple fan is the perfect way to beat the summer heat! This amusing little fan features an eye-catching pineapple design and measures only seven inches – making it ideal for placing in virtually any part of your humble abode.

This portable compact LED solar lantern is a must-have for anyone who loves spending time outdoors. Weighing a mere 2.6 ounces, this ultra lightweight lantern folds flat for easy storage, has a 12 hour battery life, and is bright enough to light up a 100 square foot room.

Relax, stretch, and rejuvenate your neck and shoulders anytime, anywhere with the neck hammock. It sports two medical grade adjustable straps that you can conveniently hang on any door so that you can get quick neck and back relief!

The day has finally come when pigs fly – kind of! Although this portly little battery operated piggy can’t actually fly on his own, it comes with a ceiling mount so that you hang him and watch him hover in circles as he flaps his little wings up and down.

Get the young whipper snappers interested in science by having them build their very own mini musical Tesla coil. The kit comes with everything needed to easily build a compact singing Tesla coil that emits a charming melody as the sparks fly.

Get whisked off to your favorite corner deli the next time you decide to soak in a relaxing bath by dropping in these roast beef sandwich bath salts. These deliciously weird premium quality bath salts make the perfect gift for any meat lover that enjoys pampering themselves.

The Bripe coffee brewing pipe is the must-have accessory for any caffeine addict who loves the great outdoors. This ultra portable copper pipe allows you to easily whip up a savory cup of Joe, espresso, or tea in less than three minutes.

Train your pup to ring a bell when he wants to go outside by placing this housebreaking dog doorbell on your doorway. This adjustable belt comes fitted with small yet loud bells that will jingle to notify you when your doggy has to go outside.

Keep your vehicle from overheating while it’s parked outside by equipping your ride with the automatic car umbrella. This functional accessory helps keep your car protected from the elements and can be easily deployed using the small keychain remote.

Maintain order inside your drawers on a daily basis by placing one of these honeycomb drawer organizers inside each one. It can easily be placed inside any standard drawer and provides 32 hexagonal slots ideal for ensuring your clothes remain separated.

If you’re struggling with what to get the tinkerer in your life for their upcoming birthday, feast your eyes on this unique Mini Strandbeest model kit. They’ll be able to construct a cool little moving kinetic sculpture that is powered solely by the wind.

Make any room in your home come to life by creating some eye-catching ambient lighting by putting together your very own puzzle light. Each kit comes with 30 individual pieces that you can assemble to 1 of 15 possible lamps designs.

Commemorate your love of gambling like a true high roller by dropping some serious change on this Bell and Ross casino watch. The face of this unique and extravagant timepiece comes styled like a pint-sized golden roulette wheel.

Ensure your kid’s day is filled with fun and adventure by placing him behind the wheel of this Jurassic Park ride-on Jeep. It comfortably seats 2, tops out at 5 miles per hour, and comes fitted with onboard speakers that emit cool dinosaur roaring sound effects.

Keeping your campsite bug-free is as easy as turning on this mosquito zapping camping lantern. This 2-in-1 rechargeable lantern comes fitted with a small waterproof ultraviolet light bug zapper that will provide a 16 x 16 foot mosquito-free zone.

Keep your facial game on check like a true Nordic warrior by mansccaping your mug using this Viking axe straight shaving razor. This awesome straight razor is forged out of tempered steel and is complemented by a handmade beech wood and copper or brass handle.

Ensure you always have the perfect insult for any occasion by keeping this mix and match profanity generator handy. When standard insults just won’t do, this book will provide you with endless alternatives like “fart gobbler”, “meat wipe”, and “crap wad”.

The Scale of Things is the incredibly intriguing read that will change how you view the world around you. It brings together facts and figures in a scientific yet visually captivating way – embracing popular topics covering everything from science to geography to politics.

titleEN: Kahuna Mega Blast Inflatable Water Park
content: Turn your backyard into the coolest place in the entire neighborhood by blowing up the Kahuna Mega Blast inflatable water park. It boasts two continuous water blasting cannons and an ample sliding surface that is big enough for several kids to slide down at once.

Give the mundane task of telling time a fun out-of-this-world twist by hanging up this cool rocket moon wall clock. Thanks to the clock’s clever design, you’re treated to an ongoing flight flow as the small rocket orbits around the crater-filled moon ever sixty seconds.

titleEN: The People Of Walmart Coloring Book
content: Bring the gloriously odd breed of shoppers known as The People of Walmart to life with your artistic skills. This adult themed coloring book contains page after page of the wonderfully weird shoppers you’re likely to encounter at the land of Walmart.

Slice through envelopes, tape, and other everyday objects with warrior like ferocity with one of these folding pocket samurai knives. They feature an aircraft grade aluminum body and a razor sharp 440c stainless steel tanto blade complete with a Japanese engraving.

Perfect your percussion technique without receiving noise complaints from the neighbors by using this air drumming percussion instrument. It’s compatible with both Windows and Apple operating systems and is portable enough to take virtually anywhere.

Paper airplanes are so twentieth century. Step into the future of flight with this smartphone app controlled airplane. This compact carbon fiber and EPP foam airplane can be easily controlled using your smartphone and features a flight time of 12 minutes per charge.

Add a dash of style to any room in your home by turning on this quaint little transparent table lamp. Available in one of eight cool colors, each lamp features a completely see-through design that makes the old fashioned Edison bulb become the star of the show.

Feel like a mighty Nordic warrior by grabbing a hold of this intimidating hand forged steel viking axe. These axes are expertly made in the Ukraine without the use of any CNC machines or other modern day tools – guaranteeing that each piece is truly one-of-a-kind.

Fitting rooms just became obsolete. Prime Wardrobe is the new service from Amazon that let’s you try on clothes before you buy them. After ordering, you’ll have a full week to try them out and send back whatever you didn’t like or didn’t fit right using a prepaid shipping label.

When you gotta go, you gotta go. With this reusable portable travel urinal you’ll be able to do just that – even if there’s no bathroom in sight. It features a shrinkable design for easy transport and can extend to hold up to 750 mL of liquid.

Fire up the good times as you create a cozy environment with the campfire in a can. Whether the night calls for a propane lit fire or a traditional wood burning flame, this sturdy and portable can is ready to meet the challenge!

Minimize the risk of serious injury when you’re hanging something over your home’s staircase with the PiVit ladder leveling tool. It’s fully adjustable and sports extra grippy feet ideal for smooth surfaces in addition to a large non-slip surface so your ladder remains in place.

Help maintain cleanliness and order in your bathroom using the Mighty toiletries organizer. The innovative design allows you to conveniently stick it onto any smooth vertical surface to provide a handy storage spot for everything from your toothbrush to your razor.

Achieve inner peace and/or ponder the meaning of life while trimming the tiny branches of the Brazilian rain bonsai tree. This small bonsai tree looks great in any indoor or office environment and functions as a fabulous accent for your home zen garden.

BoxLock is the smart padlock that only unlocks when the correct barcode is scanned – so your packages can safely get dropped off, even if you’re not home. It features a simple push button scan, up to a 60 day battery life, and sports a sturdy weatherproof case.

Slather your delicious fast food in savory sauce without making a mess by outfitting your ride with this in-car condiment holder. This clip is specially designed to fit into your car’s air vent so that you can conveniently dip your food while you’re on-the-go.

titleEN: Sh*t I Can’t Remember Password Journal
content: With the ever increasing amount of accounts you create online, remembering all your passwords can get a bit tricky. Luckily, with the ‘sh*t I can’t remember” password journal by your side you’ll be able to conveniently write down all your login info so it’s always at hand.

Ensure you remain visible to oncoming traffic when you’re exercising at night by heading out in this LED reflective cycling and running vest. This fashionable vest comes fitted with thin LED strips over the front and lower back so that you stand out in dark environments.

Enjoy delicious and refreshing smoothies and milkshakes on demand by whipping them up using this slushie shake maker. It allows you to conveniently prepare smoothies, shakes, slushies, and even frozen cocktails in mere minutes.

Washing all the dirt and grime off Rover has never been easier than with the 360 degree dog washer. Simply add soap and connect to the hose and a string of water jets will wash every inch of filth off of your pup in less than a minute.

Cook your premium slab of meat to perfection every time with this digital steak thermometer. This grill and oven friendly thermometer can accommodate up to 4 probes and simultaneously display their temperatures so that you can monitor all your steaks at once.

Enjoy hours of cute and adorably quirky dogs with the pug mugshot book as your coffee table’s centerpiece. It features page after page of mugshots portraying these oddly appealing pups placed in all types of scenarios along with witty captions.

Keep your little furball in total comfort while they lounge around the house by getting them this comfy hot dog pet bed. This adorable little hot dog shaped bed sports two soft and fluffy bun cushions in addition to a removable and washable cushion.

Barista Tested, Barista Approved. The KRUVE Sifter brings competition-level coffee quality to the home brewer. With two tiers and up to twelve interchangeable sieves, it can make any coffee taste better, regardless of the brew method.

This wearable Bluetooth keyboard is the revolutionary new product designed to turn anything around you into your own personal keyboard. It allows you to easily type, navigate through screens, and even control smart TVs just by tapping your fingers on any surface.
